sourcesContent:
export function nightTimeLabelTexts(dayNumber:number, step:number) {
  return labelTexts[dayNumber][step]
}

export function nightTimeButtonTexts(dayNumber:number, step:number) {
  return buttonTexts[dayNumber][step]
}

// NIGHT OF DAY 0
export const speechSchoolAnnouncement = 'Mm, ahem, this is a school announcement. It is now 10 p.m. As such, it is officially nighttime. \
Okay then. Sweet dreams, everyone! Good night, sleep tight, don\'t let the bed bugs bite. \
Everyone should now be asleep.'
export const speechAbilitiesAndItems = 'It is now officially nighttime. Please raise your hand if there is something you\'d like to do before going to bed. \
Enter any night time abilities or items into the phone that let a person to investigate someone\'s role at night'
export const speechToTraitorsAwake = 'Traitors, wake up. Check to see if there are other traitors among the group. \
Blackened, while keeping your eyes closed, raise your hand or give a signal to let the traitors know who you are. \
Traitors, the screen also reveals all the traitors in grey and the Blackened in black. \
I will give you some time to identify one another and the Blackened player'
export const speechToTraitorsSleep = 'Traitors, go back to sleep.'
export const speechToBlackenedAwake =  'Blackened, wake up. Place the bullet card in front of the player you would \
like to attack. On Night 0, the victim will only lose an item card and will not be killed. Press the button below when you are done'
export const speechToBlackenedSleep = 'U pu pu pu. Blackened, go back to sleep.'
export const speechToMonomi = 'Monomi, wake up. Click the player you would like to protect. If nobody, click continue.'

const night0LabelTexts = ['', 'Go to sleep', '', 'Go to sleep', 'Attack', 'Go to sleep']

const night0ButtonText1 = 'Click here to start Night Time sequence'
const night0ButtonTexts = [night0ButtonText1, '', '', '', 'Done', '']


const night1Speeches2 = 'Okay then. Sweet dreams, everyone! Good night, sleep tight, don\'t let the bed bugs bite. Everyone should now be asleep.'


const night1ButtonText1 = ''
const night1ButtonTexts = [night0ButtonText1, '', '', '', '', '', '']

const night1LabelText3 = 'Go to sleep'
const night1LabelTexts = ['', '', night1LabelText3, '', '' , '', '']

// AGGREGATE
const buttonTexts = [night0ButtonTexts, night1ButtonTexts]
const labelTexts = [night0LabelTexts, night1LabelTexts]
